required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety, Pharmacokinetic, and Pharmacodynamic Study of TS-142 in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Clinical Pharmacological Study of TS-142 in Non-Elderly and Elderly Healthy Participants (A Repeated-Dose Study to Evaluate the Safety, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of TS-142 in Elderly and Non-Elderly Participants)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate the safety, pharmacokinetics, and pharmacodynamics of repeated dosing of TS-142 when administered once daily to healthy Japanese non-elderly and elderly participants

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Treatment-emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) and Serious AEs (SAEs)
primary_outcome.description: Number of Treatment-emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) and Serious AEs (SAEs) reported as mild, moderate, severe

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve AUC (tau)
primary_outcome.description: Concentration of TS-142 and its metabolites in plasma

primary_outcome.measure: Step2; Subjective Alertness via Karolinska Sleepiness Scale (KSS)
primary_outcome.description: Step2; as a measure of subjective alertness which is scored by 10 cm-VAS scale ranging from 1, extremely alert, to 9, extremely sleepy at the next morning after administration.

intervention.description: Non-elderly participants will receive 20 mg of TS-142 once daily for 7 consective days
Elderly participants will receive 20 mg of TS-142 once daily for 7 consective days
Elderly participants will receive placebo once daily for 7 consective days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Body mass index (BMI) â‰¥18.5 and <25.0 kg/m^2 and body weight is more than 40.0 kg at screening inspection
- Other protocol defined inclusion criteria could apply
Exclusion Criteria:
- History of clinically relevant disease of any organ system that may interfere with the objectives of the study or provide a risk to the health of the participant
- History of drug and food allergy
- Other protocol defined exclusion criteria could apply
